B

Board - Class in oware
The Board class has the logic for a text based game of Oware such as how to sow, harvest, or determine who is up.
Board() - Constructor for class oware.Board
Board constructs the playing board for oware

D

drawBoard(Board) - Static method in class oware.Game
drawBoard is a helper method that prints the game board

G

Game - Class in oware
The Game class has the game logic for a text based game of Oware
Game() - Constructor for class oware.Game
 
Game.Action - Enum in oware
The Action enum enumerates the possible actions a player can take
Game.PlayerMove - Class in oware
PlayerMove is a class that contains a player Action type, but also contains the house position of the move when the Action is of type PLAY
getHouseIndex(char, char) - Method in class oware.Board
getHouseIndex maps character representations of the player and house to an index in the houses array
getNextHouseIndex(int) - Method in class oware.Board
getNextHouseIndex returns the next house in the houses array
getNorthHousesArray() - Method in class oware.Board
getNorthHousesArray gets a deep copy of the North player's houses
getNorthScore() - Method in class oware.Board
getNorthScore get the number in northStore
getPlayerMove(Scanner, Board, char) - Static method in class oware.Game
getPlayerMove gets a player's move using text based I/O Precondition: the Scanner parameter is assumed to be constructed by the caller
getPlayerSeeds(char) - Method in class oware.Board
getPlayerSeeds get the number of seeds on the players side
getPreviousHouseIndex(int) - Method in class oware.Board
getPreviousHouseIndex returns the previous house in the houses array
getSouthHousesArray() - Method in class oware.Board
getSouthHousesArray creates a deep copy of the South player's houses
getSouthScore() - Method in class oware.Board
getNorthScore get the number in southStore

H

harvest(char, int) - Method in class oware.Board
harvest if opponents house count is 2 or 3 capture seeds

isValidMove(char, char) - Method in class oware.Board
